purpose: Bootstrap autonomic physiology data for HeartWaves clustering MVP

datasets.title: Autonomic Aging Cardiovascular Variability Dataset
datasets.notes: Large cohort with healthy and cardiovascular disease groups; useful for baseline autonomic variability distributions.

datasets.title: Cardiorespiratory Response to Orthostatic Challenge
datasets.notes: Healthy orthostatic challenge responses; useful for normal standing transition patterns.

datasets.title: Continuous Monitoring of Cerebral Blood Flow and Arterial Pressure in Adults With Type 2 Diabetes
datasets.notes: Autonomic neuropathy related physiology; useful as dysautonomia-like proxy data.

datasets.title: Cerebral Vasoregulation in Elderly with Stroke
datasets.notes: Cerebral blood flow and blood pressure recordings in older stroke survivors and controls.
